text: Kim Kardashian West is planning'an intimate little dinner'for Kanye West's birthday. The Keeping Up With The Kardashians star has revealed she's decided to keep things low - key for the rapper's 41st birthday on Friday and just wants to put together a small meal with their close friends and family at their house in Hidden Hills, California. Speaking to E! News, the 37 - year - old beauty said :'I'm planning a dinner for him at our house.
